>
[Splendid Floodlight](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1785)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes](/Sources.aspx?ID=188) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 1,600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands or mounted

**Bulk** 3
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This drum-shaped metal floodlight has a metal handle on each side and a housing at its base to be slotted into a stand or pedestal. A _splendid floodlight_ has a primary function as well as several secondary functions available by rotating through a series of translucent sheets called gels. A _splendid floodlight_ comes with the four gels described below, but other gels exist with different abilities.
